attributes.action: Encourage politicians/clerical leaders to personally host Ukranians in need.
attributes.additional_details: To demonstrate that they truly understand that their role is service to the people.
attributes.background: Lead by example in offering second homes/church property and financial support to ensure basic human rights of food, clothing and shelter are met.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to host foreign nationals are a matter for private individuals, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Implement arrangements to enable English households to sponsor Ukraine refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610542

Create a system to house Ukrainian families with children in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609714
